entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NATIVEAOT] lld duplicate symbol compilation error when building for linux-bionic-arm #100191
  • xcode-select : error : tool 'xcodebuild' requires Xcode - new error with nativeaot in .NET 9 preview 2 #100189
  • A Bug when DispatchProxy.Create #100188
  • [NativeAOT/macos-arm64] System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests fail with exit code 138 #100175
  • at GC_Regressions._v2_0_beta2_452950_452950_452950_._v2_0_beta2_452950_452950_452950_cmd() #100174

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Metadata not trimmed for nested Interface types when compiling TerraFx.Interop.Windows #66716
    Future
  • After upgrade to 8.0.0, setting AOT compilation to true breaks published Blazor app on Windows 10 if using LazyLoaded references #96004
    8.0.x
  • How to release dll load by mono? #100136
  • [wasm][debugger] Timeout waiting for CheckInspectLocalsAtBreakpointSite #91773
    9.0.0
  • Test failed: Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_22888/test22888 #13703
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Build win-x86 NativeAOT runtime pack #100195
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Fix double definition of RhGetCurrentThunkContext on linux-bionic-arm #100192
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use clang --version to get Apple toolset version #100190
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix HalfNumberBufferLength #100187
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Optimize DWARF encoding for empty frames on linux-arm64 #100183
    arch-arm64, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][wbt] Debug InnerSendMessageToServerAsync #100182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Optimize BigInteger formatting #100181
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate header Separator logic #100179
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Move a few allocations behind IsHttp3Supported checks #100178
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Cache more info on HttpMethod #100177
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Convert most of variant to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Populate JsonPropertyInfo.AttributeProvider in the source generator. #100173
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Delete RequiresProcessIsolation on some tests #100172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update VS install requirements to bump Windows 10 SDK version #100170
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Improve collided exception performance #100169
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #100168
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Trim unused interfaces #100000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add JitOptRepeat configuration options #100154
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Ascii API in HttpConnection.WriteAsciiString #100180
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for struct returns from Swift reverse pinvokes #100091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix unbound MAC work in GetCertContentType #100163
    area-System.Security
  • Initial spec for the meaning and relationships between data contracts #99936
    area-Meta
  • Remove more Helper Method Frames #100116
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Clear m_nodeToLoopMemoryBlockMap when preparing to repeat optimizations #100164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable nogcregion #100167
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete unused ThreadStore::m_maxThreadCount #100171
    area-VM-coreclr
  • LogicalName added for EmbeddedResource #99999
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Call the Copy Constructor for stack arguments in C++/CLI on x86 #100050
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add a uniform representation for parameter ABI information #100138
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Prevent hoisting nodes with order side effects #100160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • JIT: initial work on general count reconstruction #99992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] handle exceptions #100148
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] disable jiterp #100156
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Revert to full `NativeName` by interop with JS #99956
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview3] Revert #99140 #100147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix mismatch between boxed/unboxed method entrypoints #99443
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Optimize (typedef|table|declsec)_locator metadata loading #100157
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Support setting NamedPipeClientStream.ReadMode with PipeAccessRights ctor overload #100001
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [ILLink] Mark recursive interface implementations in MarkStep #99922
    NO-MERGE, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Segmentation fault during `dotnet restore` on ARM64v8 .NET 8 docker image #39724
  • dotnet format: Analyzers subcommand tries to load unreferenced assemblies #39723
  • dotnet publish not same as publish from visual studio #39721

PullRequests

Updated

  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No error reported for overload ambiguity with extension methods with identical signatures and `params` arrays #72696
  • IDE0040 `for_non_interface_members` option doesn't work #72693
  • Type comparison may not work properly for metadata types #72692

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove primary ctor when moving a type. #72695
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Provide all possible keywords in xml doc comment `langword` tag #72694
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use raw strings in test code #72691
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Correct active statement span tracking #72690
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove feature flag option #72689
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update AI rename UI to make suggestion button more button-like #72676
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Simplify updating the primary workspace without passing in a version #72688
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Forward diagnostic reanalysis request to be a lsp pull diagnostic refresh instead #72659
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Create stronger type to expression compilation tracker internal policy #72673
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add Emit3 to `-testCompilerOnly` build flag #72685
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Opt into stj serialization on LSPclient #72675
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not generate obsolete `Exception` constructor #72671
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • generate package for clasp binary to ensure symbols exist #72686
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix exception for non-cs/vb document #72677
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot create a new Blazor(Razor Component) inside a sub folder. ( this works in .NET 8) #54726
  • SignalR tolerance for packet loss #54725
  • Blazor streaming rendering without JavaScript #54724
  • UsePathBase not working for Blazor Web App NET8 with individual accounts interactivity mode server #54723
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #54721
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #54720
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #54719
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #54718
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #54717
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #54716
  • Make types in Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.Internal internal #54712

Closed

  • Route Params are not able to validate Guid[] parameters #54602
  • Blazor DynamicComponent is reusing old instances and their states #54727
  • WebSockets.AcceptWebSocketAsync disables custom exception handler #54671
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, multiple_queries #54661

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection
  • Set correct ProductVersion for productVersion.txt #54710
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Point Node-Externals submodule to a commit that exists #54715
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Update MSDN URL in OAuthHandler #54691
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24165.20 #54588
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Use cached ILogger instances to avoid repeated creation of these instances #53200
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make types in Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.Internal internal #54707
    area-dataprotection
  • Limit parallelism of forced key ring refreshes #54627
    area-dataprotection
  • Implement Redis distributed cache without Lua #54689
    feature-caching, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Mac Catalyst Webview very low frame rate #21412
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21411
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [Testing] Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21410
    .NET 8 SR4
  • XA1018 Specified AndroidManifest #21406
  • very High Load time in Bindable Layout with vertical Stack Layout #21405
  • Memory Leak on back and Fro navigation on page where Custom control and complex View Page #21404
  • Memory Leak on Page Navigation while removing the page. #21403
  • Add Padding to CollectionView #21402

Closed

  • [iOS-Release] CommunityToolkit-MAUI: Showing Toast Crashes #21407

PullRequests

Created

  • Still measure children if size is known on CV #21409

Updated

  • [macOS] Make window overlay to redraw correctly during window resizing #21371
    community ✨
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline comments #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Revert "[iOS] Clear BindingContext when cell is queued for reuse (#14… #21400
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
